description: Comfortable, newly decorated, apartment, with 2 large BR, with all amenities incl. The apartment is on the 11th floor of a high rise in East Harlem, steps away from the 4,5,6 subway stop on 125th St. Pharmacy, grocery, coffee/breakfast places, restaurants/bars within walking distance. Short subway rides to anywhere, like 2 express stops to midtown (10-15 mins to Grand Central!) 4 express stops to downtown & a short bike ride (5 mins if you bike fast ☺️) or walk (20 mins) to Central Park! Enjoy!
name: Cozy, neat, spacious 2 BR apartment in East Harlem
review:
The place was really nice, very confortable beds and wide space. We enjoyed our stay there.
It was a little bit messy to get to the apartment as Gonda was traveling for work, but, if you can match her in the city, you'll have no issues.
